name: STORM BREAKERS demos
description:
A collection of 4 playable demos showing off the capacity of Storm Breakers, an all in one Unity asset designed for epic deep water simulations (upcoming).

  • Fishing In Deep Blue Sea demo shows off what the package is optimized for : a boat satisfying splashing on the waves of a rough sea.
  • Sailing simulation at the sunset shows that Storm Breakers can also render calm and beautiful seas. The ship is actually powered by the wind with an included foil component used to simulate the sails and the keel.
  • Surviving a Storm demo shows off what the package can simulate in an unseen way : stormy sea with massive breaking waves roaring loudly, realistic water interaction for both big ship and small boat, but mostly an epic and shivering sea experience. Take control of the lifeboat and try to survive in this raging sea to watch the ship sinking helplessly !
  • Epic surfing (upcoming).

To play the demo, use the arrows or WASD to control either the boat or the camera move when in auto pilot. Use the mouse to orbit the camera and the wheel to zoom. Toggle auto pilot with Q.

The demo is free, but any donation would greatly help me move further on !

Join the community now ! https://discord.gg/MxQxGyskAG

Note : the 3D models, skybox texture and engine audio clip won't be included in the Storm Breakers package, but links to download them will (most of these asset are free).
